title: Jerry Lee Lewis: Listen to 10 Songs From a Rock ’n’ Roll Pioneer
description: From “Great Balls of Fire” to “Over the Rainbow,” whether the songs were brash or tearful, Jerry Lee Lewis was indomitable.
dc:creator: Jon Pareles
media:credit: Ron Galella Collection via Getty Images
media:description: Jerry Lee Lewis in the late 1980s. His music, even when he was making it within the Nashville country establishment in the 1960s and 1970s, chafed at confinement
